student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! Let’s talk about professions. Can you tell me what job you’re interested in or describe one you know? For example, "A teacher helps students learn."
I am want to be doctor. They help sick people.

That’s great! Doctors take care of people’s health. They check patients, give medicine, and sometimes do surgeries. Can you tell me what kind of doctor you want to be? For example, "A dentist helps with teeth."
I want be pediatrician. They work with kids.

That’s wonderful! Pediatricians are doctors for children. They check kids’ health, give vaccines, and help when they are sick. Do you know any other jobs that work with children? For example, "A teacher works with kids in school."
A nurse helps kids in hospital.

Yes, nurses are very important! They help doctors and take care of patients, including kids, in hospitals. They give medicine, check temperatures, and make sure patients are comfortable. You’ve done a great job describing professions today! Keep practicing, and you’ll do amazing. Good luck with your dream of becoming a pediatrician!
Thank you! I will keep practice.
Good job! You have completed the task. Keep practicing, and you’ll get even better. Talk to you later!
